List of parishes in the Diocese of Salfo: St Mary's parish in Bacup was founded in 1852. The parish priest is Fr Frank Thorpe.
Our Immaculate Mother & St Anselm parish in Whitworth was founded in 1860. The parish priest is Fr Frank Thorpe.
St Joseph & St Peter parish in Newchurch-In-Rossendale was founded in 1915. The parish priest is Fr Philip Boast.
The Immaculate Conception parish in Haslingden was founded in 1854. The parish priest is Fr Canon John Mackie.
St Veronica (Chapel of Ease) in Helmshore was founded in 1959. It is served from The Immaculate Conception parish.

The parish of St James the Less is located in the town of Rawtenstall, within the Rossendale borough, and operates under the UTCÂ±00:00 timezone. Founded in 1828, the parish priest is Fr David Lupton, who also serves as Rural Dean. This parish currently remains open.

The parish of St Joseph was located in the village of Stacksteads, Lancashire, United Kingdom. It was founded in 1947 and closed in 2005. There is no information available on the parish priest during its operation.
